Moja talia (w stanie początkowym)
Wybierz karty do wymiany [{0}/{1}]
Szukaj
Przeciwnik opuścił grę
Rozgrywka zakończyła się twoim zwycięstwem!
Wybierz karty
JĘZYK:
POLSKI
Geralt z Rivii
Brak umiejętności.
If that's what it takes to save the world, it's better to let that world die.
Ciri: Dash
Whenever this unit enters the graveyard, return it to your deck and Strengthen it by 3.
Know when fairy tales cease to be tales? When people start believing them.
Saesenthessis: Blaze
Banish your hand and draw that many cards.
I inherited my father's ability to assume other forms - well, one other form, in my case.
Triss Merigold
Deal 5 damage.
I can take care of myself. Trust me.
Villentretenmerth
After 3 turns, destroy the Highest units. 3 Armor.
Also calls himself Borkh Three Jackdaws… he's not the best at names.
Ale of the Ancestors
Apply Golden Froth to the row
Boros, the legendary founder of Clan Fuchs, died after overindulging in this beverage - he passed out while reaching for his golden ring, which had fallen into a brook.
Yennefer: Conjurer
Deal 1 damage to the Highest enemies on turn end.
A good sorceress must know when to conjure ice... and when to conjure fire.
Dandelion: Vainglory
For every Geralt, Yennefer, Ciri or Zoltan card in your own starting deck gain 3 points
Dandelion told me all about your adventures. How'd he ready you for battle with his songs, how he tamed the kayran by playin' his lute...
Avallac'h
Truce: Each player draws 2 cards
You humans have... unusual tastes.
Lambert: Swordmaster
Deal 4 damage to all copies of an enemy unit.
Go teach your grandma to suck eggs.
Triss: Butterfly Spell
Boost the Lowest allies by 1 on turn end.
Cap'n... our arrows, they've... they've got wings!
Zoltan: Scoundrel
Choose One: Spawn a Companion that boosts 2 adjacent units by 2; or Spawn an Agitator that deals 2 damage to 2 adjacent units.
Apologies. My exotic pet's a clever birdie, but a wee bit lewd. Paid ten thalers for the beaute.
Eskel: Pathfinder
Destroy a Bronze or Silver enemy that is not boosted
Heard you panting from three miles away. Just didn't wanna give up that vantage point.
Geralt: Professional
Deal 4 damage to an enemy unit. If it's a monster unint, destroy it instead.
I accepted a job once, did it. Asked to choose my reward, I invoked the Law of Surprise.
Ihuarraquax
Deal 5 damage to self. When the current power is equalt to the base power, deal 7 damage to 3 random enemy units at the end of the turn.
"Inconceivable. Impossible", Ciri thought, returning to her senses. "Unicorns don't exist, not any more, not in this world. Unicorns are extinct."
Ciri
Whenever you lose a round, return this unit to your hand. 2
I go wherever I please, whenever I please
Gaunter O'Dimm
Gamble with Gaunter: Guess whether the power of the card he's picked has power lesser, equalt or greater than 6.
He always grants exactly what you wish for. That's the problem.
Geralt: Aard
Deal 3 damage to 3 enemies and move them to the row above.
A blast of concentrated energy that pummels everything in its path. Great for when you forget your keys.
Regis: Higher Vampire
Look at 3 Bronze units from your opponent's deck. Consume 1, then boost self by its base power.
He becomes invisible at will. His glance hypnotizes into a deep sleep. He then drinks his fill, turns into a bat and flies off. Altogether uncouth.
Vesemir: Mentor
Play a Bronze or Silver Alchemy card from your deck.
Killing monsters is not something to be taken lightly. Ciri must understand that if she's to become one of us.
Yennefer
Choose One: Spawn a Unicorn that boosts all units by 2; or Spawn a Chironex that deals 2 damage to all units.
Magic is Chaos, Art and Science. It is a curse, a blessing and a progression.
Geralt: Yrden
Reset all units on a row and remove thair tokens.
He lay down next to Adda's mummified remains, drawing the Yrden Sign on the inner side of her sarcophagus' lid.
Triss: Telekinesis
Create and play a bronze special card from either player's current deck.
Bindings won't suffice. Nor will a gag render her any less dangerous. No, dimeritium is the only solution.
Geralt: Igni
Destroy the Highest units on an enemy row if that row has a total of 25 or more.
A twist of a witcher's fingers can light a lamp… or incinerate a foe.
Aguara
Choose Two: Boost the Lowest ally by 5; Boost a random unit in your hand by 5; Deal 5 damage to the Highest enemy; Charm an enemy Elf with 5 power or less.
Smarten up right now, or it's off to an aguara with you!
Phoenix
Resurrect a Bronze or Silver Draconid.
What came first, the chicken or the egg? Compared to the conundrum that is the phoenix, the question seems downright trivial.
Dandelion: Poet
Draw 1 card and then play 1 card.
The quill is mightier than the sword.
Avallac'h: Sage
Spawn a copy of a random Gold or Silver unit from your opponent's starting deck.
Amongst the free elves were a handful of Aen Saevherne, or Sages. They were an enigma, bordering on a legend.
Aguara: True Form
Create a Bronze or Silver Spell
Ever heard of an "anterion"? Think of it as the opposite of a lycanthrope: a beast which can take on a human form.
Regis
Drain all boosts from a unit.
Men, the polite ones, at least, would call me a monster. A blood–drinking freak.
Ciri: Nova
If you have exactly 2 copies of each bronze in your deck, the base power of this card becomes 22 points.
Zireael possesses a great power she cannot control. She is a danger - to herself, to others. Until she learns to control it, she should remain isolated.
Korathi Heatwave
Apply a Hazard to each enemy row that deals 2 damage to the Lowest unit on turn start.
Vicovaro scholars have determined that, in the absence of imperial aid, drought-stricken provinces lose half their population, two-thirds of their livestock and all their will to rebel.
Ragh Nar Roog
Apply a Hazard to each enemy row that deals 2 damage to the Highest unit on turn start.
In the Final Age, Hemdall will come forth to face the evil issuing from the land of Morhogg – the legions of wraiths, demons and specters of Chaos
Renew
Resurrect a Gold unit.
Medicus curat, magicae sanat.
Royal Decree
Play a Gold unit from your deck and boost it by 2.
We, Foltest, by divine right King of Temeria, Prince of Sodden, Senior Protector of Brugge, etcetera, etcetera, do hereby decree the following..
Vigo's Muzzle
Move a Bronze or Silver enemy with 8 power or less to the opposite row.
Not every beast can be tamed. But all can be muzzled.
Wolfsbane
After 3 turns in the graveyard, deal 6 damage to the Highest enemy and boost the Lowest ally by 6.
Also known as 'the queen of poisons,' wolfsbane is used in many witcher Potions and alchemic brews
Hanmarvyn's Blue Dream
Spawn a copy of a Gold unit from your opponent's graveyard and boost it by 2.
This spell lets you see the last moment's of a dead man's life... if you can survive its casting.
Uma's Curse
Create a Gold unit
I give you three solid leads, trails as fresh as morning dew, the aid of my spies and my court sorceress. Yet in my daughter's stead, you bring me this... monstrosity?
Trial of the Grasses
Deal 10 damage to a unit, unless it's a Witcher. If it survives, boost it to 25 power.

Imagine a lump of clay. In order to shape it, you must first moisten it or it will crumble. The Trial's initial part does just that. It opens the body to change, so to speak. Only then can the mutagens produce a witcher.
Shupe's Bizzarre Adventure
If your starting deck has no duplicates, send Shupe on an adventure.
Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?
Sihil
Choose One: Deal 3 damage to all enemies with odd power; or Deal 3 damage to all enemies with even power; or Play a random Bronze or Silver unit from your deck.
"What's written on this blade? That a curse?" "No. An insult."
Sarah
交换1张颜色相同的牌。
来陪小莎拉玩游戏吧！
Iris' Companions
将1张牌从牌组移至手牌，然后随机丢弃1张牌。
我们的名字还是不说为好。就当我们是……主人家的朋友吧。
Germain Piquant
Spawn 2 Cows on each side of this unit.
陶森特需要这位英雄，但它不配。
Nivellen
Move all units on a row to random rows
迷路了？要迷路到其它地方去，只要别在我这儿瞎逛就行。把你的左耳对准太阳，一直往前，没多久就能走上大路。怎么？你还在等什么？
Stregobor
Truce: Each player draws a unit and sets its power to 1.
猎魔人见过看上去像议员的贼，见过看上去像乞丐的议员，也见过看上去像贼的国王。不过斯崔葛布的样子，就和大众心目中法师的形象没什么两样。
Johnny
Discard a card. Then make a copy of a card of the same color from your opponent's starting deck in your hand.
要是再也没办法亲口说出“狮子头上长虱子”，生活就真的太无趣啦。
Cyprian Wiley
Weaken a unit by 4
诺维格瑞的黑帮四巨头之一——另外三个是西吉·卢文、卡罗·“砍刀”·凡瑞西和乞丐王。
Ocvist
Single-Use. After 4 turns, deal 1 damage to all enemies, then return to your hand on turn start.
他是石英山之主，毁灭者，图拉真的屠夫。但在闲暇时间里，他喜欢远足和烛光晚餐。
Carlo Varese
Deal 1 damage for each card in your hand.
每个想要在诺维格瑞做生意的都很清楚——要么同意卡罗的条件，要么就夹着尾巴滚出去。
Myrgtabrakke
Deal 2 damage 2 times.
永远别想分开母龙和她的孩子。
Vesemir
Summon Eskel and Lambert.
就算上了绞架也别放弃——让他们给你拿点水，毕竟没人知道水拿来前会发生什么。
Eskel
Summon Vesemir and Lambert.
白狼，我只是个普通猎魔人。我不猎龙，不跟国王称兄道弟，也不和女术士纠缠……
Olgierd von Everec
Deathwish: Resurrect this unit on a random row
至少你知道我的头不好砍了。
Francis Bedlam
If losing, Strengthen self up to a maximum of 15 until scores are tied
要是我缺鼻子或者断手了，那显然，乞丐王接受这两种付款方式。
Operator
Single-Use. Truce: Make a default copy of a Bronze unit in your hand for both players.
时空在我们面前瓦解，也在我们身后膨胀，这就是穿越。
Lambert
Summon Eskel and Vesemir.
这样的沟通方式才对路嘛！
Vaedermakar
Spawn Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog or Alzur's Thunder
控天者德鲁伊能操控各种元素之力，让狂风暴雨化为绕指柔风，降下毁天灭地的雹暴，还能拖雷掣电让敌军灰飞烟灭……所以我给你个忠告：面对他，一定要毕恭毕敬。
Roach
Whenever you play a Gold unit from your hand, Summon this unit
杰洛特，我们得来场人马间的对话。恕我直言，你的骑术……真的有待提高，伙计。
Iris von Everec
Spying. Deathwish: Boost 5 random units on the opposite side by 5.
我的回忆所剩无几……但每次想到我的玫瑰，记忆便会涌现。
Dorregaray of Vole
Create any Bronze or Silver Beast or Draconid.
和猎魔人一样，多瑞加雷也热爱同怪物打交道。不过他有自己的一套分类系统。别人眼里面目可憎的食尸生物、食人魔，在他看来都特别可爱。
Dudu
Deploy: Choose an Enemy and copy its Power.
拟态怪有很多别名：易形怪、二重身、模仿怪……变形怪。
Prize-Winning Cow
Deathwish: Spawn a Chort
Black Blood
Choose One: Create a Bronze Necrophage or Vampire and boost it by 2; or Destroy a Bronze or Silver Necrophage or Vampire.
吸血鬼们纷纷表示：使用这种药水有违体育精神。
Alzur's Double–Cross
Boost the Highest Bronze or Silver Unit in your Deck by 2 and play it.
阿尔祖创造的一些怪物仍在四处游荡，其中便有令人胆寒的巨蜈蚣——它杀掉了创造自己的法师，摧毁了半个马里波，然后逃进了河谷地区幽暗的森林。
Artefact Compression
Transform a Bronze or Silver unit into a Jade Figurine.
雕像瞬间爆开，颤动不已，犹如一道在地上爬行的烟雾，变换着自己的形状。道道光芒里，有东西上下纷飞，不断成形。片刻之后，魔法圈的正中间突然现出了一道人影。
Bekker's Dark Mirror
Transfer up to 10 power between the Highest and Lowest unit.
当你凝视深渊的时候，深渊也在凝视着你。
Commander's Horn
Boost 5 adjacent units by 3.
士气加一分，听力减三分。
Decoy
Return a Bronze or Silver Ally to your Hand, Boost it by 3 and play it.
如果拿来应急，假人也是不错的挡箭牌。
Dimeritium Bomb
Reset all boosted units on a row.
女巫猎人必备。无声的闪光过后，最强大的法师也得乖乖就擒。
Manticore Venom
Damage a unit by 13.
剧毒致命的速度快得让你连尼弗迦德皇帝的头衔都念不完。
Marching Orders
Boost the Lowest Bronze or Silver Unit in your Deck by 2 and play it.
我们只不过是老头子们的棋子，为他们腐朽的妄想命丧沙场……
Merigold's Hailstorm
Halve the power of all Bronze and Silver units on a row.
天空突然暗了下来，云层笼罩在城镇上空。愁云惨淡之中，寒风呼啸而过。“哦，我的天哪，”叶奈法吸了口气，“看起来你成功了……”
Necromancy
Banish a Bronze or Silver unit from either graveyard, then boost an ally by its power.
无论怎样……我们都有办法叫你开口。
Scorch
Destroy all the Highest Units.
杰洛特退了一步。他见过不少被烧弹击中的人，更准确地说，他见过不少烧弹留下的残骸。
Skellige Storm
Apply a Hazard to an enemy row that deals 2, 1 and 1 damage to the leftmost units on the row on turn start.
这可不是普通风暴，这是天神之怒。
Summoning Circle
Spawn a default copy of the last Bronze or Silver non-Agent unit placed on the board.
在我们所处的位面之外，还存在着许许多多的位面……只要掌握了正确的知识，就可以接触并召唤远超人类想象的生物。
The Last Wish
Draw your top 2 cards. Play 1 and shuffle the other back.
亲爱的先生们，一只气灵三个愿望，随后它们就会跑回自己的界域去。
White Frost
Apply a Frost Hazard to 2 adjacent opposing rows. Frost Hazard: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage the Lowest Unit on the row by 2.
见证“泰德戴尔瑞”——终焉纪元——这被白霜摧毀的世界吧！
Tainted Ale
Deal 6 damage to the Highest enemy on each row.
这酒原本就是绿色的吗……？
Mandrake
Choose One: Heal a unit and Strengthen it by 6; or Reset a unit and Weaken it by 6.
衮衮诸公，瞠目环立，不肯相信这高贵的发现。有的在谈曼陀罗花，有的又说是在用黑犬。
Bekker's Rockslide
Deal 2 damage to up to 10 random enemies.
只要一块小石子，我们就完蛋了。
Glorious Hunt
If losing, Spawn an Imperial Manticore. If winning or tied, Spawn Manticore Venom.
以诸神的名义，猎魔人，你把这鬼东西拿来干嘛？！“我要那畜生的脑袋！”这句话不过是打个比方！
Dragon's Dream
Apply a Hazard to an enemy row that will explode and deal 4 damage to all units when a different special card is played. Added to the game.
在瑟瑞卡尼亚，龙神崇拜体现在日常生活的各个方面。因此也难怪他们会以此为武器命名了。
Garrison
Create a Bronze or Silver unit from your opponent's starting deck and boost it by 2.
咚咚咚，有人在家吗？
Adrenaline Rush
Toggle a unit's Resilience status.
那野兽狂暴地扑来，眼中怒火熊熊，全然不顾疼痛和抵抗者的拼命反击。挡它者，唯有一死……
Alzur's Thunder
Deal 9 damage.
我们全然无法念诵“阿尔祖落雷术”这样深奥复杂的咒语。据说，阿尔祖声如狩猎号角，言若讲演名家。
Arachas Venom
Damage 3 adjacent Units by 4.
“若不慎接触眼部，请立即用冷水冲洗，然后起草遗嘱。”
Biting Frost
Apply a Hazard to an enemy row that deals 2 damage to the Lowest unit on turn start.
寒霜凛冽的好处就是尸体不会腐烂得那么快。
惊悚咆哮
摧毁1个友军单位。 生成1头“熊”。
起初我们碰上了一头熊……悲剧就从那时开始了。
Dimeritium Shackles
Lock a unit. If an enemy, deal 4 damage to it.
瑞达尼亚人将巫师的手腕拧到背后，给他戴上镣铐，并使劲晃了晃。特拉诺瓦叫喊挣扎，还弯下腰呕吐呻吟——杰洛特这才明白手铐的材质。
Epidemic
Destroy all the Lowest units.
瘟疫不仁，以万物为刍狗。
Clear Skies
Choose One: Boost all damaged allies under Hazards by 2 and clear all Hazards from your side; or Play a random Bronze unit from your deck.
太阳出来了，德洛米！太阳出来了！也许我们命不该绝……
Petri's Philter
Boost up to 6 random allies by 2.
但在那一夜，月色如血。
Impenetrable Fog
Apply a Hazard to an enemy row that deals 2 damage to the Highest unit on turn start.
优秀指挥官的福音……拙劣指挥官的噩梦。
Lacerate
Damage all Units on a row by 3.
那绝对是你前所未见的恐怖场景——可怜的家伙……躺倒在地，任凭怪兽肆意摆布。
Spores
Choose one: reset a unit and strengthen it by 3; or reset a unit and weaken it by 3.
Carried by the wind across the Continent… Sowing madness and blight where they fall.
Shrike
Damage up to 6 random Enemies by 2.
虽对人类致命，但药水的毒性对猎魔人来说却微乎其微。
Wyvern Scale Shield
Boost a unit by the base power of a Bronze or Silver unit in your hand.
比一般的盾牌要坚固，而且更时髦。
Stammelford's Tremors
Deal 1 damage to all enemies.
巫师斯丹莫福德曾将一座挡住他高塔视线的大山移走。传言他有这等移山之力，全因得到了一只地灵——也就是土界灵——的服务。
Swallow
Boost a unit by 10.
这种药水能加速伤口的结痂和痊愈，而它之所以叫做“燕子”，因为雨燕是春天与希望的象征。
Thunderbolt
Boost 3 adjacent units by 3 and give them 2 Armor.
猎魔人脸色陡变……平日的风度荡然无存，令人毛骨悚然。
Torrential Rain
Apply a Hazard to an enemy row that deals 1 damage to 2 random units on turn start.
这儿连雨都带股尿骚味。
Mahakam Ale
Deploy: Boost a random Ally on each row by 4.
无可争议是矮人们对世界文化所作出的最杰出贡献。
Crow's Eye
